name: 1000000th-customer-prize
description: Imagine a little while from now RedMart is closing in fast on delivering its 1 millionth order. The marketing team decides to give the customer who makes that order a prize as a gesture of appreciation. The prize is a fun one: the lucky customer gets a RedMart delivery tote and 1 hour in the warehouse. Use the hour to fill up the tote with any products you desire and take them home for free.
